title: Ep 11: Why We Changed Our Name... and Advice! Our Self-Care Routines, Dealing With Disappointment, and Paying Off Credit Card Debt.
itunes:title: Ep 11: Why We Changed Our Name... and Advice! Our Self-Care Routines, Dealing With Disappointment, and Paying Off Credit Card Debt.
description:
In today's episode we are sharing why we changed our name! But also, advice! We are talking about a bunch of random things this week. We got asked about our self-care routines, how to deal with disappointment, and how to pay down credit cards. We also talk about our obsessions (Becca's hair product obsession + a mascara update), and Grace's love of Clark's Botanicals..

Join us next week for our next book club to discuss To All The Boys I've Loved Before by Jenny Han.

In the meantime, loving Bad on Paper?

Join our FB group for amazing book recs & more

Follow us on Instagram @badonpaperpodcast
